title: Geography (Japan): Cities (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the Cities subcategory within Geography (Japan). Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Sapporo city has hosted many different international sporting events over the years.
cards.romaji: Sapporo-shi de wa naganen ni watari, samazama na sup tsu no ibento ga kaisai sarete imasu.
cards.japanese: 札幌市では長年にわたり、様々なスポーツのイベントが開催されています。
